DOC.brief_title: Efficacy DLBS1033 Patients With Acute Ischemic Stroke
DOC.detailed_description: There 3 group treatment ; group consist 43 subject treatment regimen : - Treatment I : 1 tablet DLBS1033 490 mg thrice daily , meal - Treatment II : 1 tablet aspirin 80 mg daily , meal - Treatment III : 1 tablet clopidogrel 75 mg daily , meal Bleeding profile ( measure INR value , PT , aPTT ) clinical outcome ( measure Gadjah Mada Stroke Scale Barthel Index ) evaluate efficacy investigational drug perform baseline end study ( Month 3rd ) . General condition subject followed-up every month three month study medication . Physiotherapy provide subject assign Physiotherapist .
